# Django Tri-State Module

Brief introduction to the module and its functionality.

## Installation

Instructions on how to install the `tri` module. 

```bash
pip install django-tristate  # Example command if available via PyPI
```

## Configuration

  # settings.py
  INSTALLED_APPS = [
      ...
      'tri',
  ]
